title: Google Assistant can repel mosquitos with this neat connected repellant system
content:
With Winter coming to a close, we’re all excited to get back outdoors. To help with the pesky mosquitos that will be coming back out in the coming months, Thermacell has just launched a new mosquito repellant system that works with Google Assistant.

more…

The post Google Assistant can repel mosquitos with this neat connected repellant system appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The "Liv" system from Thermacell can repel mosquitoes from your backyard, and it works with Google Assistant too!
